T13n929u_005:78: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma |
T13n929u_005:79: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam ||39 ||
T13n929u_005:80: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā |

T13n929u_005:95: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya ||47 ||

T13n929u_006:2: tato hṛte bharttari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyāmaratau kṛtāyām |

T13n929u_006:26: eṣyāmyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi taṃ pratijñām |
T13n929u_006:27: kasmānnu hetordayitapratijñaḥ so'dya priyo me vitathapratijñaḥ ||13 ||
T13n929u_006:30: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdaya viraktam |
T13n929u_006:31: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt ||15 ||
T13n929u_006:32: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣṭā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato'nyā |
T13n929u_006:33: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satiṃ māmāgamad vihāya ||16 ||
T13n929u_006:34: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yāvavocattasya prayātuṃ mayi so'padeśaḥ |

T13n929u_006:38: necchanti yāḥ śokamavāptumevaṃ śraddhātumarhanti na tā narāṇām |
T13n929u_006:39: kva cānuvṛttirmayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena ||19 ||
T13n929u_006:40: ityevamādi priyaviprayuktā priye'nyadāśaṅkya ca sā jagāda |

T13n929u_006:52: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī |

T13n929u_006:54: saṃcintya sacintya guṇāṃśca bharturdīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa tatāma caiva |

T13n929u_006:56: na bhūṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni |
T13n929u_006:57: nirbhūṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva ||28 ||
T13n929u_006:59: yatnācca vinyastatamālapatrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamājaṃ gaṇḍau ||29 ||
T13n929u_006:63: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā ||31 ||

T13n929u_006:65: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda ||32 ||
T13n929u_006:68: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau |
T13n929u_006:69: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram ||34 ||
T13n929u_006:70: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ |
T13n929u_006:72: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ |
T13n929u_006:76: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca |
T13n929u_006:77: sā pṛṣṭhatastāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛjya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsyuvāca ||38 ||
T13n929u_006:78: rājarṣivadhvāstava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ |
T13n929u_006:80: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyaste |
T13n929u_006:82: yadyanyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bharttā hṛtaste kuru bāṣpamokṣam |
T13n929u_006:83: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇāḍhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet ||41 ||

T13n929_018:82: bhrātrā tvayā śreyasi daiśikena pitrā phalasthena tathaiva mātrā |
T13n929_018:83: hato'bhaviṣyaṃ yadi na vyamokṣyaṃ sārthāt paribhraṣṭa ivākṛtārthaḥ ||41 ||
T13n929_018:84: śāntasya tuṣṭasya sukho viveko vijñātatattvasva parīkṣakasya |
T13n929_018:86: atho hi tattvaṃ parigamya samyaṅnirdhūya doṣānadhigamya śāntim |
T13n929_018:87: svaṃ nāśramaṃ samprati cintayāmi na taṃ janaṃ nāpsaraso na devān ||43 ||
T13n929_018:88: idaṃ hi bhuktvā śuci śāmikaṃ sukhaṃ na me manaḥ kāṃkṣati kāmajaṃ sukham |
T13n929_018:90: aho'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham |
T13n929_018:91: sudhīramadhyatmasukhaṃ vyapāsya hi śramaṃ tathā kāmasukhārthamṛcchati ||45 ||
T13n929_018:92: yathā hi ratnākarametya durmatirvihāya ratnānyasato maṇīn haret |
T13n929_018:93: apāsya saṃbodhisukhaṃ tathottamaṃ śramaṃ vrajet kāmasukhopalabdhaye ||46 ||
T13n929_018:95: apāsya yaddhyānasukhaṃ mune paraṃ parasya duḥkhoparamāya khidyase ||47 ||
T13n929_018:96: mayā nu śakyaṃ pratikartumadya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇyanukampake tvayi |
T13n929_018:98: tato ministasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ |
T13n929_018:99: idaṃ babhāṣe vadatāmanuttamo yadarhati śrīghana eva bhāṣituṃ ||49 ||
T13n929_018:100: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvameva dhīmannabhidhātumarhasi |
T13n929_018:103: na dṛṣṭasatyo'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃbata buddhimānapi ||51 ||
T13n929_018:105: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagatyavasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ ||52 ||
T13n929_018:106: sadharma dharmānvayato yataśca te mayi prasādo'dhigame ca kauśalam |
T13n929_018:107: ato'sti bhūyastvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaśca niyogamarhasi ||53 ||
T13n929_018:108: avāptakāryo'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te'sti kiñcit karaṇīyamaṇvapi |
T13n929_018:109: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parānapi ||54 ||
T13n929_018:112: ihottamebhyo'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmamavāpya naiṣṭhikam |
T13n929_018:114: vihāya tasmādiha kāryamātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryamapyatho |
T13n929_018:115: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamāvṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatāmayam ||57 ||
T13n929_018:116: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janastvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ
T13n929_018:117: aho batāścaryamidaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yadayaṃ kathāmiti ||58 ||
T13n929_018:118: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayairmanorathaiḥ |
T13n929_018:119: vadhūrgṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ ||59 ||
T13n929_018:120: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā |
T13n929_018:121: manasi śamadamātmake vivikte matiriva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya ||60 ||
T13n929_018:122: ityarhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāsturmūrdhnā vacaśca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā |
T13n929_018:123: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvānmuneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva ||61 ||
T13n929_018:124: bhikṣārthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīrjanasyākṣipan
T13n929_018:126: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine
T13n929_018:128: ityeṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ
T13n929_018:130: yanmokṣāt kṛtamanyadatra hi mayā tatkāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ
T13n929_018:131: pātuṃ titkamivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syāditi ||63 ||
T13n929_018:133: kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti |
T13n929_018:134: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ
T13n929_018:136: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñā-vyākaraṇa“ nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta |
